# Aspire-Full

> .NET Aspire Full AppHost with bleeding-edge tooling for AI-assisted development

## Overview

This project demonstrates a complete .NET Aspire distributed application setup with:
- .NET 10 SDK (LTS)
- Aspire 13.0.1 (stable)
- Entity Framework Core with PostgreSQL
- Docker-based devcontainer with named volumes
- GitHub CLI tooling with AI extensions
- AI-optimized documentation

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://github.com/DeanLuus22021994/Aspire-Full/blob/master/docs/guides/getting-started.md): Setup and run the application
- [Architecture](https://github.com/DeanLuus22021994/Aspire-Full/blob/master/docs/guides/architecture.md): System architecture and design
- [API Reference](https://github.com/DeanLuus22021994/Aspire-Full/blob/master/docs/api/index.md): REST API documentation
- [DevContainer](https://github.com/DeanLuus22021994/Aspire-Full/blob/master/docs/guides/devcontainer.md): Development environment setup
- [GitHub Tooling](https://github.com/DeanLuus22021994/Aspire-Full/blob/master/docs/guides/github-tooling.md): CLI tools and extensions

## Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/DeanLuus22021994/Aspire-Full.git
cd Aspire-Full

# Run with Aspire CLI
aspire run

# Or with dotnet
dotnet run --project Aspire-Full
```

## Key Technologies

| Technology | Version | Purpose |
|------------|---------|---------|
| .NET SDK | 10.0.100 | Runtime and build |
| Aspire | 13.0.1 | Distributed app orchestration |
| EF Core | 10.0.0-preview | ORM with PostgreSQL |
| Docker | 28.x | Containerization |
| React | 19.x | Frontend SPA |
| CUDA | 12.x | GPU Acceleration |

## Project Structure

```
Aspire-Full/
├── .devcontainer/          # Docker devcontainer config
├── .github/workflows/      # CI/CD pipelines
├── Aspire-Full/            # AppHost project
├── Aspire-Full.Api/        # REST API with EF Core
├── Aspire-Full.Tensor/     # High-performance Tensor operations (C# + CUDA)
│   ├── Native/             # C++ CUDA kernels and CMake build
│   └── Services/           # Managed GpuTensor<T> wrappers
├── Aspire-Full.Web/        # React frontend
├── Aspire-Full.Tests.Unit/ # Unit tests (xUnit)
├── Aspire-Full.Tests.E2E/  # E2E tests (NUnit)
├── docs/                   # Documentation
├── scripts/                # Automation scripts
└── llms.txt                # AI documentation index
```

## Tensor Operations (Aspire-Full.Tensor)

The `Aspire-Full.Tensor` project provides high-performance GPU-accelerated tensor operations using a hybrid C#/.NET 10 and C++/CUDA architecture.

### Key Components
- **GpuTensor<T>**: A generic RAII wrapper for GPU memory management. Supports `float` and `long`.
- **TensorComputeService**: High-level service for executing operations like Matrix Multiplication, Mean Pooling, and ReLU.
- **Native Build**: Uses `docker buildx bake` to compile CUDA kernels (`.cpp` files) into a shared library (`.so`/`.dll`) which is P/Invoked by the managed layer.

### API Endpoints

### Items API
- `GET /api/items` - List items
- `POST /api/items` - Create item
- `PUT /api/items/{id}` - Update item
- `DELETE /api/items/{id}` - Delete item

### Users API (Upsert/Downsert)
- `GET /api/users` - List active users
- `POST /api/users` - Upsert: Create or reactivate
- `DELETE /api/users/{id}` - Downsert: Soft delete
- `POST /api/users/{id}/login` - Record login

### Admin API
- `GET /api/admin/users` - All users (including deleted)
- `POST /api/admin/users/{id}/promote` - Promote to Admin
- `POST /api/admin/users/{id}/reactivate` - Reactivate user
- `DELETE /api/admin/users/{id}/permanent` - Hard delete
- `GET /api/admin/stats` - Admin statistics

## Database Schema

```
Users (soft-delete enabled)
├── Id, Email (unique), DisplayName
├── Role (User/Admin), IsActive
├── CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, DeletedAt, LastLoginAt
└── Items (1:N navigation)

Items
├── Id, Name, Description
├── CreatedAt, UpdatedAt
└── CreatedByUserId (FK → Users, nullable)
```
